alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Cobb; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:19PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Paulding, southwestern Cherokee, northwestern Cobb and southeastern Bartow Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1219 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Acworth, or 9 miles northwest of Marietta, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Kennesaw, Acworth, Hiram, Emerson, Cross Roads, Burnt Hickory Ridge, Due West, Lost Mountain Park, Oak Grove, Kennesaw State University and New Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
